body: Did he ask though? Or just question
megaten IV needs moar works Isabeau, Nozomi and Toki are awesome (and Asahi is meh)
if you ask for translations, you will die
Haaaah... Why don't translators seem to like these works? To my knowledge, not a single one of the Atlus Super Stars doujinshi have been translated into any language, let alone English. >_>
